lines.text: Now I see the Dragon Balls.
Look, kid. Listen, When you fought and lost, you were pretty angry am I right?
That's why you lost! Don't you get it? You couldn't see clearly.
Your mind is like that water, and your anger, is just like the ripples that disturbed the water. Calm your mind so that you can see clearly.
Yeah! Now I get it. Gosh, your really wise.
Oh, well, thank you. My name is Korin, the cat. I don't get many visitors up here that's why I live so high up. Only sincere seekers manage to find me.
It doesn't make sense that the Emperor would hurt so many people to get the Dragon Balls. He's such a kind-hearted young man.
Wow! Check it out! The Dragon Balls should be right below us, guys!
Oh, great, it's at the bottom of the ocean.
Too bad we didn't bring our swimsuits.
Pigs don't float, I'm off the hook.
